channel.title: A really nooby question
channel.description:
Hey guys, ive decided to make a source using devolution instead of defaultscape V2 (dev is more stable)
Now im trying to change his starting items iopen up player.java, and search for unique!
But i can't find ANYTHING!
I tryed importing the player n player handler of default, but it came up with 100 errors.
Now im woundering, how do u change the inventory, so when they log in they don't have bronze shield n longsword, they have different items?
And how do i change starting place??
Regards, Johno

item.title: A really nooby question
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Nvm, i figured it, i searched for the bronze longsword item id, found it so now i no how 2 add items 2 inven when they log in ^^

Read full topic
